info.title: Trigger an alert in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnButton
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Trigger Alert' button
testPageDocument.querySelector('#alert-trigger').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Trigger Alert' button, activate the button to trigger the alert.
